title:
RICHMOND ZONING BYLAW 8500, AMENDMENT BYLAW 10478 (RZ 23-018081)
(Location: 4831 Steveston Highway; Applicant: Anthony Boni (Boni Maddison Architects))
contents:
Resolution: It was moved and seconded

That Richmond Zoning Bylaw 8500, Amendment Bylaw 10478 be given second and third readings.

The question on the motion was not called as discussion ensued with respect to the need for more affordable housing to address the housing crisis, and the project’s compliance with the Official Community Plan.

The question on the motion was then called and it was CARRIED.See minutes for detail

title: REZ #20-09 - 3777 AND 3791 KINGSWAY - HIGH-DENSITY MIXED-USE DEVELOPMENT
contents: Purpose: To seek Council authorization to forward this application to First Reading and to a future Public Hearing date, if necessary.

title: ZONING BYLAW AMENDMENTS - Burnaby Zoning Bylaw 1965, - Amendment Bylaw No. 33, 2019 - Bylaw No. 14079
contents: Rez. #19-36 3713 Kensington Avenue From: CD Comprehensive Development District (based on C2 Community Commercial District, P6 Regional Institutional District and P2 Administration and Assembly District) To: Amended CD Comprehensive Development District (based on C2 Community Commercial District, C3e General Commercial District, P6 Regional Institutional District and P2 Administration and Assembly District in accordance with the development plan entitled “Adamas ESports” prepared by Dsquared Projects) The purpose of the proposed zoning bylaw amendment is to permit one of the units within the Fortius Centre to be utilized for an e-sports training facility.

title: MANAGER'S REPORTS - PROPOSED REZONING BYLAW ABANDONMENTS
contents: Purpose: To seek Council authorization to abandon outstanding Rezoning Amendment Bylaws in accordance with the adopted Council process.

title: MANAGER'S REPORTS - EXPANDED SITE - 5151 AND 5255 NORTH FRASER WAY - REZONING REFERENCE #19-12 - BIG BEND AREA PLAN
contents: Purpose: To inform Council of an expanded site proposed for Rezoning Reference #19-12.

title: MANAGER'S REPORTS - EXPANDED SITE - 5151 AND 5255 NORTH FRASER WAY - REZONING REFERENCE #19-12 - BIG BEND AREA PLAN
contents: Purpose: To inform Council of an expanded site proposed for Rezoning Reference #19-12.
